Package risingStarEMS

Class SimpleEmailService

java.lang.Object
risingStarEMS.SimpleEmailService
All Implemented Interfaces:
EmailService
public class SimpleEmailService extends Object implements EmailService
An implementation of a simple email service allowing for sending emails notifying users of passwords being changed or reset.
Version:
1.0 unstable
Author:
Adam Tay
